1800WxBrief parm description: Exclude graphics
Exclude Nextgen content
Exclude plaintext
Exclude historical METARs
Exclude en route METARs and TAFs only if the filed altitude is at least 18,000ft
Display Description: Include enroute METARS and TAFS (if filed alt is >=18,000ft)

1800WxBrief parm description: Exclude Winds Aloft data not within 4000ft of the filed altitude
Exclude en route obstructions more than 1000ft below the filed altitude
Exclude Graphical Forecast beyond the departure time
Display Description: Include graphical forecast beyond departure time

1800WxBrief parm description: Exclude Flow Control Messages
Exclude NHC Bulletin

Exclude State Department NOTAMs
Exclude Military NOTAMs
Exclude en route navigational VOR NOTAMs
Display Description: Include en route navigational VOR NOTAMs

Display Description: Include en route navigational NDB NOTAMs

Display Description: Include en route navigational DME NOTAMs
